description.displayText: Susan is my health coach for a chronic and difficult health condition. She's a practical, warm and sympathetic person with a wide knowledge of alternative health practices. She has suggested many products and therapies (like CBD oil, and exercise regimens) that have improved my well-being and are great alternatives to increasing medication. She's also an amazing researcher who has found the best consultants for my health issue. She is a calm and persistent patient advocate when dealing with doctors and medical staff, and I highly recommend her as a health coach and/ or care giver.
description.originalText: Susan is my health coach for a chronic and difficult health condition. She's a practical, warm and sympathetic person with a wide knowledge of alternative health practices. She has suggested many products and therapies (like CBD oil, and exercise regimens) that have improved my well-being and are great alternatives to increasing medication. She is a calm and persistent patient advocate when dealing with doctors and medical staff, and I highly recommend her as a health coach and/ or care giver.

description.displayText: I have known Susan for many years. However, a few years ago, I came onboard, helping her with respite care for her Mom. What I realized was that Susan never stopped looking for ways to improve the care for her Mom! She was constantly researching on her Mom's disease and finding ways to make her life better, more enjoyable, easier. Susan's research was thorough and dependable, addressing many issues, including diet, vitamins, disease progression and much much more. Susan was very thorough also, in the respite care she chose for her Mom. I have met many caregivers in my time as a caregiver also and I firmly believe that Susan is the best I've yet to encounter. She leaves no stone unturned, in seeking and providing the best possible care for those in her care. Her mother was very blessed to have her for the years she did. Susan even addressed her hobbies, such as reading and scrabble, making sure there was no shortage of scrabble players. She is HIGHLY recommended!!!

description.displayText: Susan's ability to connect, intuit, and represent the person she is caring for is second to none.  She will partner with the patient, family, medical, and overall care team to make sure the best service level is provided.  Her experience and attention to detail lend a specific benefit in the level of care she provides, as she will not only follow the care plan, but likely will immerse herself in it and find ways to offer suggestions and enhancements.

She will partner with the patient, family, medical, and overall care team to make sure the best service level is provided.  Her experience and attention to detail lend a specific benefit in the level of care she provides, as she will not only follow the care plan, but likely will immerse herself in it and find ways to offer suggestions and enhancements.

description.displayText:
In the areas of care giving to seriously ill patients, as well as end of life care,
Susan has superior expertise, skills and abilities.
In addition to her knowledge and experience, Susan is compassionate, and professional in how she approaches a patient and his or her family.
I would not hesitate to hire Susan to advise and care for someone, whose care was important to me.
I am very pleased to write this recommendation.
Sincerely,
Caroline S., Medical Social Worker in long term care, home health and hospice.

description.displayText: Susan is very dedicated to the welfare of the individual she is attending. Weather it was the care of wounds or the ability to prevent the break down of skin, Hygiene, nutrition, to the cleanliness of the surroundings. The level of care while I worked for her for about 10 years was above and beyond what you find in most care facilities and privet homes. She is also very knowledgeable and will do extensive research.
description.originalText: Susan is very dedicated to the welfare of the individual she is attending. Weather it was the care of wounds or the ability to prevent the break down of skin, Hygiene, nutrition, to the cleanliness of the surroundings. description.displayText: In my experience as a case manager and senior advocate for the Central VT Council on Aging, I have rarely known an individual as committed as Susan to providing support and the highest standard of care to her mother. She made it a priority to understand all aspects and treatments for her mother's medical conditions, researching the best therapy practices, including medication and nutritional supports. The ingenuity with which she employed and created adaptive equipment to facilitate her mother's functionality in the home environment was extraordinary. Additionally, Susan managed a home-based 24/7 care situation that included training and oversight of a team of caregivers, working closely with staff to sustain her mother's health and welfare to the fullest extent possible.

description.displayText: She is one of the strongest advocates for seniors I have ever worked with. She goes the extra mile to get them what the need, even if she has to break down barriers to get it. She gives excellent care and is extremely dependable. She has strong initiative and thinks through problems to find solutions.

description.displayText: Susan goes above and beyond with researching how best to accommodate the person she's caring for. She's a dedicated caregiver and I highly recommend her.
description.originalText: Susan goes above and beyond with researching how best to accommodate the person she's caring for. She's a dedicated caregiver and I highly recommend her.

description.displayText: Susan took care of her elderly mother for years and was devoted to her care. I was the physician to her mother and saw how good she was with her. I am sure she would care for other elderly individuals with equal enthusiasm.
